body_html: @cle-ros Can you give me an example of what new correct behavior it would allow? It seems likely that it would also allow a lot of silently weird, unexpected behavior (whenever the pattern of imperative updates doesn't fit with the case you have in mind), so I'd be leery.
body_text: @cle-ros Can you give me an example of what new correct behavior it would allow?  It seems likely that it would also allow a lot of silently weird, unexpected behavior (whenever the pattern of imperative updates doesn't fit with the case you have in mind), so I'd be leery.
body: @cle-ros Can you give me an example of what new correct behavior it would allow?  It seems likely that it would also allow a lot of silently weird, unexpected behavior (whenever the pattern of imperative updates doesn't fit with the case you have in mind), so I'd be leery.
